001import javax.swing.AbstractAction;
002import javax.swing.Action;
003import javax.swing.KeyStroke;
004import javax.swing.Timer;
005import javax.swing.SwingUtilities;
006
007import java.awt.Graphics;
008import java.awt.Graphics2D;
009
010import java.awt.Image;
011import java.awt.image.BufferedImage;
012import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
013import java.awt.image.AffineTransformOp;
014
015import java.awt.event.KeyEvent;
016import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
017import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
018
019import java.lang.Math;
020/** Player.java - A ship for the player to manipulate during game
021* This class features inheritence as it inherits from GamePiece which is a requirement
022* per project specification a. 
023* @author Daniel Andrews
024* @author Final Project
025*/
026public class Player extends GamePiece{
027        private Image destroyedImage; // Ship explosion animation
028
029        private double x, // Store ship's x and y coordinates 
030                                   y;
031
032        private double direction, // Store ship's kinetic direction and ship's physical orientation
033                                imageDirection; 
034
035        private double turningSpeed, // Ship's ability to turn and move
036                                   movingSpeed;
037
038        private double speedCap, // Ship's speed cap, friction to slow down, and thrust acceleration
039                                   acceleration,
040                                   friction,
041                                   thrustSpeed;
042
043        private boolean turningLeft, // Store ship's states
044                                        turningRight,
045                                        moving,
046                                        reloaded,
047                                        enabled = true,
048                                        invulnerable,
049                                        flashing,
050                                        destroyed;
051
052        private Action leftPressed, // Actions to register keyboard input
053                                   leftReleased,
054                                   rightPressed,
055                                   rightReleased,
056                                   upPressed,
057                                   upReleased,
058                                   spacePressed,
059                                   spaceReleased;
060
061        private double momentumX,
062                                   momentumY,
063                                   accelX,
064                                   accelY,
065                                   speed;
066        // Action listener to control ship's invulnerable animation
067        private ActionListener flash = new ActionListener() {
068                                        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
069                                                flashing = !flashing; // Alternate ship flashes
070                                        }
071                                };
072
073        private Timer flashTimer = new Timer(250, flash); // Timer to activate flash event
074
075        /** Constructor takes player's x and y coordinates in the game window
076        * @param x Player x coordinate
077        * @param y Player y coordinate
078        */
079        public Player(double x, double y) {
080                this.x = x; // Set x and y
081                this.y = y;
082                imageDirection = 0; // Set ship attributes
083                direction = 360;
084                turningSpeed = 10.0;
085                movingSpeed = 0.0;
086                speedCap = 13.0;
087                acceleration = 1.0;
088                friction = 1.05;
089                thrustSpeed = 0;
090                speed = 0;
091
092                momentumX = 0;
093                momentumY = 0;
094                accelX = 0;
095                accelY = 0;
096
097                // Retrieve player sprites from controller
098                setImage(Asteroids.gc.getPlayerImage());
099                setRotatedImage(getImage());
100                destroyedImage = Asteroids.gc.getPlayerDestroyedImage();
101
102                // Set all states
103                turningLeft = false;
104                turningRight = false;
105                moving = false;
106                reloaded = true; // Reloaded indicates if ship can shoot
107                destroyed = false;
108
109                // Create Action objects to listen for keyboard input
110                leftPressed = new LeftPressed();
111                leftReleased = new LeftReleased();
112                rightPressed = new RightPressed();
113                rightReleased = new RightReleased();
114                upPressed = new UpPressed();
115                upReleased = new UpReleased();
116                spacePressed = new SpacePressed();
117                spaceReleased = new SpaceReleased();
118
119                // Map keyboard input to corresponding action
120                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_LEFT, 0, false), "leftPressed");
121                this.getActionMap().put("leftPressed", leftPressed);
122                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_LEFT, 0, true), "leftReleased");
123                this.getActionMap().put("leftReleased", leftReleased);
124                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_RIGHT, 0, false), "rightPressed");
125                this.getActionMap().put("rightPressed", rightPressed);
126                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_RIGHT, 0, true), "rightReleased");
127                this.getActionMap().put("rightReleased", rightReleased);
128                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_UP, 0, false), "upPressed");
129                this.getActionMap().put("upPressed", upPressed);
130                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_UP, 0, true), "upReleased");
131                this.getActionMap().put("upReleased", upReleased);
132                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_SPACE, 0, false), "spacePressed");
133                this.getActionMap().put("spacePressed", spacePressed);
134                this.getInputMap().put(KeyStroke.getKeyStroke(KeyEvent.VK_SPACE, 0, true), "spaceReleased");
135                this.getActionMap().put("spaceReleased", spaceReleased);
136                
137                // Request focus at start of next frame
138                SwingUtilities.invokeLater( new Runnable() { 
139                        public void run() { 
140                        requestFocusInWindow(); // Request focus in window to ensure key input is received
141                } 
142                });
143
144                setInvulnerable(); // Player starts game out invulnerable
145        }
146
147        /** Paints component on graphics canvas
148        * @param g Canvas to paint on
149        */
150        @Override
151        public void paintComponent(Graphics g) {
152                super.paintComponent(g); // Call super paintComponent
153                Graphics2D g2 = (Graphics2D) g; // Convert canvas to 2d graphics
154
155                // If player is enabled, draw ship
156                if (enabled) {
157                        if (!invulnerable) {
158                                g2.drawImage(getRotatedImage(),(int) x,(int) y, this); // Draw solid ship
159                        } else if (invulnerable && flashing) {
160                                g2.drawImage(getRotatedImage(), (int) x, (int) y, this); // Draw flashing ship
161                        }
162                } else if (!destroyed) {
163                        // Play explosion animation after player dies
164                        g2.drawImage(destroyedImage, (int) x, (int) y, this); 
165                }
166        }
167
168        /** Set invulnerability for two seconds
169        */
170        public void setInvulnerable() {
171                invulnerable = true; // Ship cannot be harmed
172                flashing = true; // Animate flashing ship
173                ActionListener delay = new ActionListener() {
174                        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
175                                invulnerable = false; // Player is no longer invulnerable
176                        }
177                };
178                Timer timer = new Timer(2000, delay); // Player is invulnerable for two second duration
179                timer.setRepeats(false); // Timer should stop after one execution
180                timer.start(); // Start invulnerability
181                flashTimer.start(); // Start flash animation 
182        }
183
184        /** Update player each frame
185        */
186        public void tick() {
187                // Ensure player is not dead or between spawns
188                if (enabled) {
189                        // Turn image left
190                        if (turningLeft) {
191                                imageDirection -= turningSpeed;
192                                rotateImage();
193                        }
194                        // Turn image right
195                        if (turningRight) {
196                                imageDirection += turningSpeed;
197                                rotateImage();
198                        }
199                        
200                        if (moving) {
201                                // Calculate acceleration vector if player is applying thrust
202                                // Acceleration is calculated based on angle of ship
203                                accelX = acceleration * Math.cos(Math.toRadians(imageDirection));
204                                accelY = acceleration * Math.sin(Math.toRadians(imageDirection)) * -1; // y value is inverted from standard trigonometric function
205                                // Apply acceleration vector to momentum vector
206                                momentumX += accelX;
207                                momentumY -= accelY;
208                                // Calculate speed based on magnitude of momentum vector
209                                speed = Math.sqrt(Math.pow(momentumX, 2) + Math.pow(momentumY, 2));
210                                // Check that speed has not exceeded maximum
211                                if (speed > speedCap) {
212                                        double scale = speedCap / speed; // Calculate amount to scale speed
213                                        momentumX *= scale; // Scale momentum vector
214                                        momentumY *= scale;
215                                }
216                        } else {
217                                momentumX /= friction; // If player is not applying thrust, apply friction to momentum vector
218                                momentumY /= friction;
219                        }
220                        move(); // Move ship, wrapping around screen if outside boundaries
221                        screenWrap();
222                }
223
224                repaint(); // Update ship on game canvas
225        }
226        /** Wrap ship around screen if window boundaries are exceeded
227        */
228        public void screenWrap() {
229                if (x > Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH - getImage().getWidth() / 2) {x = 0 - getImage().getWidth() / 2;} // Wrap right side
230                if (x < 0 - getImage().getWidth()) {x = Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH - getImage().getWidth();} // Wrap left side
231                if (y > Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT - getImage().getHeight() / 2) {y = 0 - getImage().getHeight() / 2;} // Wrap bottom
232                if (y < 0 - getImage().getHeight()) {y = Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT - getImage().getHeight();} // Wrap top
233        }
234        
235        /** Move ship based on momentum vector
236        */
237        public void move() {
238                x += momentumX; // Change x and y position based on change in position from momentum vector
239                y += momentumY;
240        }
241
242        /** Creat a bullet that travels in direction ship is currently facing
243        */
244        public void shoot() {
245                double gunX = (x + (getImage().getWidth() / 2)) + Math.cos(Math.toRadians(imageDirection)) * 22; // Calculate where bullet should originate based on
246                double gunY = (y + (getImage().getHeight() / 2)) + Math.sin(Math.toRadians(imageDirection)) * 22; // ship heading and position
247                Bullet bullet = new Bullet(gunX, gunY, imageDirection, 15, true); // Create new bullet moving in direction ship is facing
248                Asteroids.gc.addBullet(bullet); // Hand bullet off to controller
249        }
250
251        /** Rotate image based on ship heading
252        */
253        public void rotateImage() {
254                double rotationRequired = Math.toRadians(imageDirection); // Calculate rotation needed based on zero pointing to the right
255                double locationX = getImage().getWidth() / 2; // Find center of image
256                double locationY = getImage().getHeight() / 2;
257                AffineTransform tx = AffineTransform.getRotateInstance(rotationRequired, 
258                        locationX, locationY); // Use affine transform to create rotation
259                AffineTransformOp op = new AffineTransformOp(tx, AffineTransformOp.TYPE_BILINEAR); // New transformation operation based on needed rotation
260                BufferedImage newImage = new BufferedImage(getImage().getWidth(), getImage().getHeight(), 
261                        getImage().getType()); // Use original image to minimize distortion
262                op.filter(getImage(), newImage); // Apply filter to image
263
264                setRotatedImage(newImage); // Set image to be rendered
265        }
266        
267        /** An inner class to respond to left arrow keyboard input (Pressing)
268        */
269        public class LeftPressed extends AbstractAction {
270                @Override
271                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
272                        if (enabled) {
273                                turningRight = false; // If ship is enabled cancel any right turns and begin left turn
274                                turningLeft = true;
275                        }
276                }
277        }
278
279        /** An inner class to respond to left arrow keyboard input (Releasing)
280        */
281        public class LeftReleased extends AbstractAction {
282                @Override
283                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
284                        turningLeft = false; // Stop turning left upon key release
285                }
286        }
287
288        /** An inner class to respond to right arrow keyboard input (Pressing)
289        */
290        public class RightPressed extends AbstractAction {
291                @Override
292                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
293                        if (enabled) {
294                                turningLeft = false; // If ship is enabled cancel any left turns and being right turn
295                                turningRight = true;
296                        }
297                }
298        }
299
300        /** An inner class to respond to right arrow keyboard input (Releasing)
301        */
302        public class RightReleased extends AbstractAction {
303                @Override
304                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
305                        turningRight = false; // Stop turning right upon key release
306                }
307        }
308        
309        /** An inner class to respond to up arrow keyboard input (Pressing)
310        */
311        public class UpPressed extends AbstractAction {
312                @Override
313                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
314                        if (enabled) 
315                                moving = true; // Begin moving if ship is enabled
316                }
317        }
318        
319        /** An inner class to respond to up arrow keyboard input (Releasing)
320        */
321        public class UpReleased extends AbstractAction {
322                @Override
323                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
324                        moving = false; // Stop applying movement
325                }
326        }
327
328        /** An inner class to respond to space keyboard input (Pressing)
329        */
330        public class SpacePressed extends AbstractAction {
331                @Override
332                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
333                        if (reloaded && enabled) {shoot();} // Shoot if gun is reloaded and ship is enabled
334                        reloaded = false; // Disable gun
335                }
336        }
337
338        /** An inner class to respond to space keyboard input (Releasing)
339        */
340        public class SpaceReleased extends AbstractAction {
341                @Override
342                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
343                        reloaded = true; // Re-enabled gun
344                }
345        }
346
347        /** Returns x coordinate
348        * @return x coordinate
349        */
350        public double x() {
351                return x;
352        }
353
354        /** Returns y coordinate
355        * @return y coordinate
356        */
357        public double y() {
358                return y;
359        }
360
361        /** Returns radius of mask to be used in collision checking
362        * @return Collision mask
363        */
364        public double getMaskRadius() {
365                return (double) getImage().getWidth() / 2 - 22;
366        }
367
368        /** Returns double array holding x and y coordinates of ship center
369        * @return double array representing object center
370        */
371        public double[] getCenter() {
372                double[] center = new double[2]; // Create array
373                center[0] = x + (getImage().getWidth() / 2); // Calculate center based on sprite dimensions
374                center[1] = y + (getImage().getHeight() / 2);
375                return center;
376        }
377
378        /** Destroys this object, disabling it permanently
379        */
380        public void destroy() {
381                enabled = false; // Disable object
382                ActionListener destroy = new ActionListener() {
383                        @Override
384                        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
385                                destroyed = true; // Set object state to destroyed
386                        }
387                };
388                Timer delay = new Timer(1000, destroy); // Set timer to destroy after explosion animation
389                delay.setRepeats(false);
390                delay.start();
391        }
392
393        /** Returns if this object is in an enabled state
394        * @return Returns true if object is in an enabled state
395        */
396        public boolean isEnabled() {
397                return enabled;
398        }
399
400        /** Returns if this object is invulnerable
401        * @return Returns true if object is invulnerable
402        */
403        public boolean isInvulnerable() {
404                return invulnerable;
405        }
406
407        /** Temporarily disables object, respawning it at center of screen
408        */
409        public void respawn() {
410                enabled = false; // Disable
411                momentumX = 0; // Stop any movement
412                momentumY = 0;
413                ActionListener delay = new ActionListener() {
414                        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
415                                x = Asteroids.CANVAS_WIDTH / 2; // Reset position to center of screen
416                                y = Asteroids.CANVAS_HEIGHT / 2;
417                                
418                                turningLeft = false; // Reset state of object
419                                turningRight = false;
420                                moving = false;
421                                enabled = true;
422                                destroyedImage.flush(); // Reset image animation
423                                setInvulnerable(); // Set invulnerability to prevent chain of deaths
424                        }
425                };
426                Timer timer = new Timer(1000, delay); // Set timer allowing explosion animation to play
427                timer.setRepeats(false);
428                timer.start();
429        }
430}
